title: Elegant Family Duplex with Garden in Vibrant Ołtaszyn
description: This luxurious 5-bedroom duplex residence offers spacious, sun-filled living across two levels with refined design throughout its 185 sqm. The heart of the home features open-concept living and dining with patio doors leading to a private, landscaped garden—perfect for both relaxation and entertaining. Upstairs, enjoy a deluxe balcony for morning coffees, while both modern bathrooms are finished to the highest standards. Architectural details and large windows create a harmonious flow of natural light, underlining comfort and exclusivity.
neighborhood_description: Set in the dynamic Ołtaszyn neighborhood of Wroclaw, this address balances cosmopolitan flair with leafy tranquility. Residents benefit from a trendy, expat-friendly vibe, surrounded by gourmet cafés, lush parks, and convenient shopping. With excellent highway access, the city center and international destinations are just a short drive away, enhancing both business and leisure connections.
target_buyer: Ideal for international executives, diplomats, or relocated professionals with families seeking a luxurious yet convenient lifestyle in Wroclaw's flourishing southern district.
market_positioning: This premium duplex uniquely blends large family-oriented spaces, sophisticated amenities, and seamless highway connectivity. Positioned among Ołtaszyn’s top expat-focused residences, it caters to discerning buyers looking for tranquility in a prestigious and well-connected neighborhood.
